Package algorithms.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Heuristic<T>
    Defines the heuristics of Astar
    Searchable<T>
    defines the searching problem,domain dependent
    Searcher<T>
    Define the algorithm that searches in the searching problem(domain independent)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AStar<T>
    Adding the features of the Astar to the basic BFS
    AStarTest
    Junit test for Aster class
    BFS<T>
    Adding the features of the basic BFS
    CommonBFS<T>
    Define the BFS algorithm
    CommonSearchable<T>
    defines the searching problem,domain dependent.
    CommonSearcher<T>
    An abstract class that define the algorithm that searches in the searching problem(domain independent)
    MazeAirDistance
    Define the air distance heuristic
    MazeManhattenDistance
    Define the Manhattan distance heuristic
    Solution<T>
    Defines the solution of the searching problem
    State<T>
    defines the state in the searching problem
